Projects

Social Bot Detection Using Deep Learning

Online social network are the perfect place for fraudulent and malevolent bots to spread because of their accessibility and breadth. Social bots, commonly referred to as spam bots, are robots that use social media platforms to create material automatically, communicate with other users, and try to mimic and alter other users behaviour. An effective detection algorithm is demanded to detect these social bot accounts that endanger social networks. Social BOT detection model based on Deep Learning Algorithm (DeBD) using CNN-LSTM is developed to detect social bots.

Source Code

Blood Bank Management System

The basic life support system in any multicellular organism is blood. So, in order to provide support to the people and to encourage them to donate blood,I have created a Blood Bank Database System which provides a useful interface that the users can experience. Upon logging into the database, the user is asked to login in or signup, if he/she is a first time user. The user can then choose if they want to donate blood or look for possible donors. Each link leads to the appropriate page where the user has to enter various details related to what they have chosen.Once the transaction is completed , the user is informed that the transaction is successful and the user is lead back to the login page.
